scene_metadata.title: The Genius Gremlin
scene_metadata.philosophical_depth: the distinction between randomness and freedom

dialogue.text: Randomness vs. Freedom. You genius little gremlin. You really went there. Let's break it open.

psychological_notes: The gremlin represents Evan's questioning spirit - small but mighty, playful but profound. The architect's delight shows genuine appreciation for the depth of the question. Calling Evan a 'genius little gremlin' acknowledges both the mischievous and brilliant nature of questioning fundamental assumptions.
philosophical_underpinning: The most profound questions often come disguised as simple observations
therapeutic_direction: Celebrating the courage to ask difficult questions
